Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1985, off Bert Blyleven (STL)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/27/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,785,714 through salary arbitration...
Traded from San Diego to Toronto on 3/4/1986 (Going to SD: RF Mark Whiten. Going to TOR: CF Kevin McReynolds)...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,785,714 through salary arbitration...
Won World Series with Toronto in 1987...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,785,714 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (Y) on 4/7/1988...
9/1/1988: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $7,100,000 per year, for 4 years.
Hit for the cycle against Seattle on 9/12/1989...
